column5: A beautiful two story 2,456 sqft Arlington home. The house has four bedrooms, three upstairs rooms, and a master room downstairs along with two and a half bathrooms. The kitchen comes with all appliances fridge, microwave, oven, etc. There is a game room upstairs, a dinning room that can hold eight, a spacious living room area, and a large backyard.The house comes fully furnished with Wi-Fi and cable. The home is located in a quiet family friendly In a nice and quiet neighborhood.
